description: Configure the settings of a web application firewall.

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-config list-dynamic-rule-sets
commands.summary: List the regional application gateway waf manifest.
examples: az network application-gateway waf-config list-dynamic-rule-sets -l  westus

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-config list-rule-sets
commands.summary: Get information on available WAF rule sets, rule groups, and rule IDs.
examples: az network application-gateway waf-config list-rule-sets --type OWASP
az network application-gateway waf-config list-rule-sets --group '*' --type OWASP --version 3.0
az network application-gateway waf-config list-rule-sets --group crs_35_bad_robots
az network application-gateway waf-config list-rule-sets -o table

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-config set
commands.summary: Update the firewall configuration of a web application.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway waf-config set --enabled {false, true}
                                              [--disabled-rule-groups]
                                              [--disabled-rules]
                                              [--exclusion]
                                              [--file-upload-limit]
                                              [--firewall-mode {detection, prevention}]
                                              [--gateway-name]
                                              [--ids]
                                              [--max-request-body-size]
                                              [--no-wait]
                                              [--request-body-check {false, true}]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--rule-set-type]
                                              [--rule-set-version]
                                              [--subscription]
examples: az network application-gateway waf-config set -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway --enabled true --firewall-mode Detection --rule-set-version 3.0

az network application-gateway waf-config set -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway --enabled true --rule-set-type OWASP --rule-set-version 3.0 --disabled-rule-groups REQUEST-942-APPLICATION-ATTACK-SQLI --disabled-rules 920130 920140

az network application-gateway waf-config set -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway --enabled true --firewall-mode Detection --rule-set-version 3.0 --exclusion "RequestHeaderNames StartsWith x-header" --exclusion "RequestArgNames Equals IgnoreThis"

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-config show
commands.summary: Get the firewall configuration of a web application.
examples: az network application-gateway waf-config show -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway
